title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models via Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of compose files (CPU/GPU, Open-WebUI, LangChain, etc.) to spin up full stacks.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot example using ollama-js and TailwindCSS.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantizations ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux with system-tray integration.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting, and showcase of Ollama projects.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app for private or channel-based conversations with Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.
